analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleWPTByAuction.payAllBonuses (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#426-450):
	External calls:
	- minterContract.mint(beneficiaryAddresses[i],_balances[beneficiaryAddresses[i]].mul(priceWPTperETH)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#442-447)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _balances (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#447-448)

CrowdsaleWPTByAuction.payAllBonuses (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#426-450) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-minterContract.mint(beneficiaryAddresses[i],_balances[beneficiaryAddresses[i]].mul(priceWPTperETH)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#442-447)

CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#731-744) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-minterContract.mint(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#742)

CrowdsaleWPTByAuction.balanceOf.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#282) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#108-109)

CrowdsaleWPTByAuction.payAllBonuses has external calls inside a loop:
	- minterContract.mint(beneficiaryAddresses[i],_balances[beneficiaryAddresses[i]].mul(priceWPTperETH)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#442-447)

CrowdsaleWPTByAuction.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#396-401) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#401)

CrowdsaleWPTByAuction.hasOpened (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#403-410) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (openingTime < block.timestamp && block.timestamp < closingTime) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#407-410)

CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#693-699) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#698-699)

CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.hasOpened (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#704-712) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (openingTime < block.timestamp && block.timestamp < closingTime) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7a009b2a19c6dae4ed7d3c67e759b995ebf1cbde.sol#708-711)
